title: Re-Enabling encryption after disabling all accessibility services
content:
Hello.

As you might know, data encryption stops being "enhanced" the moment you enable an accessibility service. I've been using an accessibility service until now (which I don't need anymore), and I'm wondering how to re-enable the enhanced data encryption after disabling the accessibility service.

I do not want to use secure start-up (it's annoying, and I'd like Direct Boot support). I would just like for my data to be encrypted with my PIN. I'm on Android 9.
